name: Kwangryeol Park
intro: Hi, I'm Kwangryeol Park, a front-end developer currently working at an IT consulting company based in Tokyo, Japan. For the past 3 years, I've worked as both as an IT consultant, focusing on research and requirement designs, and a front-end developer, building on the concepts and designs that I've created. Passionate about coding and user-experience, I hope to continue my career as a front-end developer making new tools and applications for the advancement and improvement of society.
work experience: IT Consultant & Front-end Developer at BayCurrent Consulting / 2018.10 - 2021.01
Front-end Developer at Nomura Research Institute / 2021.02 -
education: Undergraduate: Studied BSc Actuarial Science at LSE / 2014 - 2017
Postgraduate: Studied MSc Risk Management at LSE / 2017 - 2018
etc: Taking TypeScript and JavaScript framework courses on Udemy
